snippet: Los Angeles County’s first toll went into effect last weekend, a jarring experience for motorists used to the “free” in freeways.
abstract: Some Los Angeles motorists express frustration following the institution of the city's first freeway toll, which can now exceed $15 for travel on Interstate 110; tolls, common in many other metropolises, face strong cultural barriers in California.

byline.contributor: Angela Chen contributed reporting from El Monte, Calif.

lead_paragraph: Los Angeles County’s first toll went into effect last weekend, a jarring experience for motorists used to the “free” in freeways.

headline.seo: New Toll Jolts L.A. Motorists Used to Freeways
headline.main: Toll Unsettles Los Angeles Motorists Used to ‘Free’ in Freeways
headline.print_headline: Toll Unsettles Los Angeles Motorists Used to ‘Free’ in Freeways
